name: Yveltal
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

abilities.name: Fright Night
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon Tool card in play has no effect.

attacks.name: Pitch-Black Spear
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon-EX. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
